lead_paragraph: There is a lot to like about the Fed’s new rules on credit card penalty fees, but it dropped the ball when it refused to regulate penalty interest charges.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Card Accountability, Responsibility and Disclosure Act (2009)
